metadata.title: CVE-2019-6978 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The GD Graphics Library (aka LibGD) 2.2.5 has a double free in the gdImage*Ptr() functions in gd_gif_out.c, gd_jpeg.c, and gd_wbmp.c. NOTE: PHP is unaffected.

notes.note: mdeslaur> php uses the system libgd2

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-5.1').
